title: Module 3: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)
description: Welcome to Module 3 of our ROS 2 and Humanoid Robotics educational book. This module focuses on NVIDIA's Isaac ecosystem for creating AI-driven robotic brains, covering photorealistic simulation, accelerated perception, and intelligent navigation for humanoid robots.

next.title: Chapter 1: NVIDIA Isaac Sim for Photorealistic Simulation
